item.description:
Join PartyExpress as we head in to summer @ Splash Restaurant & Bar Featuring the band GoodNplentie.


Located in the beautiful town of Westport in a corner of an historic inn with an uninterrupted and breathtaking view of the Long Island Sound, Splash has just been awarded by The Food Network "best of" New England waterfront dining.


This highly talented and experienced eight piece band, complete with lead front male & female vocalists, horn section and accomplished rhythm section delivers a first-class performance that makes Good and Plentie one of the most in-demand bands in the New York metro area. Check them out.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Come to Splash with Party Express!!
